questions.question: Covid and flu cases were on the rise at the start of this month. What % of VA residents had received a flu shot by the first week of this year?
questions.context: Only 30% of VA residents had received flu shots for the current season and only 12% were up to date on their COVID vaccines.

questions.question: WJCC schools implemented a new policy for athletic events. What was it?
questions.context: Attendees at division sports events can no longer bring any bags into events and must also pass through CEIA Opengate metal detectors.

questions.question: Federal authorities believe they identified the killer behind at least one case of the Colonial Parkway Murders this month. Where was he from?
questions.context: The now-deceased Alan Wilmer was a waterman from the Northern Neck and responsible for the deaths of of David Knobling, Robin Edwards and Teresa Howell in the late 1980s based on DNA evidence.

questions.question: The 2024 VA General Assembly sets a new standard for diversity, with Don Scott being the first Black Speaker of the House ever. Which district does he represent?
questions.context: Scott is a Democrat from Portsmouth. There are also a record 15 women in the Senate and 32 members of the Legislative Black Caucus.

questions.question: Hampton Roads saw 6 police shootings between Dec. 19 and Jan. 19. How many are being investigated by an independent third party?
questions.context: Only 2 are being investigated by a third party, one involving James City County Police who fired at a 83-year-old man earlier this month.

questions.question: Data from eBird.org shows a steady decline of birds in North America over the past half century. In Williamsburg, which species saw the most dramatic decline of sightings?
questions.context: Canvasback sightings declined by 36% in Williamsburg over the past 50 years.

questions.question: WJCC teachers and staff will be joining colleagues in Richmond on Feb. 19 to protest the governor's education budget, which raises teacher salaries by what percent?
questions.context: The budget provides a 0.2% increase in funding for WJCC schools, but no money for teacher raises.

questions.question: The Virginia Habitat Connectivity Hub helps residents explore data related to highway safety. How many drivers hit animals in Virginia in 2022 according to State Farm?
questions.context: There were 6,100 reported collisions, killing 4 people and injuring over 500.
